comments.body: This appears like it may be an issue with https://github.com/temporalio/ringpop-go instead of this repository. It might be best to open the issue there with more detailed steps on how to replicate (granted the repository is not under active development).
Please feel free to reopen if this seems to be an issue with the Go SDK.

title: panic: runtime error: index out of range [1532] with length 1532
